description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for Business Math

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn Business Math

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .


Includes following tutorials:

Introduction,
Fractions and Decimals,
Percentage and Average,
Exponents and Powers,
Measurement and Conversions,
Series and Sequences,
Polynomials,
Roots and Radicals,
Ratio and Proportion,
Variables and Word Problems,
Simple Interest,
Compound Interest,
Profit and Loss,
Stocks and Bonds,
Depreciation,
Commission and Payroll,
Markup,
Discount,
Mortgage,
Insurance,
Taxes,
Inventory,
Probability,
Permutations and Combinations,
Statistics,
Variance and Standard Deviation,
Charts and Graphs,
Line Slope and Equation,
Graphing Linear Equations,
Geometry,
Trigonometry.

Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Basic Math I,
Quiz on Basic Math II,
Quiz on Profit, Loss and Interest,
Quiz on Stocks, Bond and Depreciation,
Quiz on Payroll, Markup and Discount,
Quiz on Mortgage, Insurance, Tax and Inventory,
Quiz on Probability and Statistics,
Quiz on Geometry and Trigonometry .


Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
